name: Costa Rican Adventures
tag_list: travel, educational-travel, experiential-travel, educational--experiential-travel, eco--immersion-adventures, costa-rica, costa-rican-travel
overview: Their Costa Rica travel packages make them a premier purveyor of eco-tourism in Central America, and their guided tours, family vacations, and teacher and student travel packages build toward the dream of creating a healthier, more sustainable planet. Equal parts educational and adventure travel, their Costa Rica vacation packages and educational adventures will find you rafting, kayaking, hiking, exploring tropical rainforests, participating in community service learning projects, and interacting with local indigenous communities.
